firstNightReminder: Tell the Nurse the number of characters in play that inflict poison, drunkenness or sickness. In this script, these characters are: Courtier, Paladin, Skeptic, Mourner, Druid, Advisor, and Plague.
name: Nurse
ability: You start knowing how many sources of drunkenness, poison and sickness are in play.

firstNightReminder: Show the Hostage the character token of the Demon in play.
name: Hostage
ability: You start knowing which Demon is in play. If an evil player publicly guesses you (once), 2 good players die.

firstNightReminder: The Doctor points at a player: Tell them 'yes' if that player is drunk, poisoned, or sick, otherwise, tell them 'no'.
otherNightReminder: The Doctor points at a player: Tell them 'yes' if that player is drunk, poisoned, or sick, otherwise, tell them 'no'.
name: Doctor
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): you learn if they are either drunk, poisoned, or sick, but you do not learn which.

firstNightReminder: The Cleric points at a player: Remove any 'poisoned', 'drunk' or 'sick' markers from those players. Afterwards, remove any 'poisoned' markers from the Cleric.
otherNightReminder: The Cleric points at a player: Remove any 'poisoned', 'drunk' or 'sick' markers from those players. Afterwards, remove any 'poisoned' markers from the Cleric.
name: Cleric
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are cured from drunkenness, poison & sickness. If you are poisoned, it only lasts for 1 night.

otherNightReminder: The Knight points at a player: Place the 'protected' marker next to them.
name: Knight
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): They are protected from the demon. If you are drunk or poisoned, you die instead of the person you protected.

firstNightReminder: The Robber points at a player: Show the Robber 3 character tokens, 1 of which belongs to that player. If the Robber is drunk, show them 3 characters that are not in play instead.
otherNightReminder: The Robber points at a player: Show the Robber 3 character tokens, 1 of which belongs to that player. If the Robber is drunk, show them 3 characters that are not in play instead.
name: Robber
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn 3 characters, 2 of which are wrong. If you are drunk, you instead learn 3 characters that are not in play.

firstNightReminder: Ask the Fairy Godmother if they want to use their ability. If they do, the Fairy Godmother will point at a player and a good character: Mark that player as 'blessed' and that character with 'full use of'. Wake that player and tell them they were selected by the Fairy Godmother. Show them the character token of the ability they may now use.
otherNightReminder: If the Fairy Godmother has not used their ability yet, ask the Fairy Godmother if they want to use their ability. If they do, the Fairy Godmother will point at a player and a good character: Mark that player as 'blessed' and that character with 'full use of'. Wake that player and tell them they were selected by the Fairy Godmother. Show them the character token of the ability they may now use.
name: Fairy Godmother
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player (not yourself) & a good character: That player gets full use of that character's ability for 1 day & 1 night.

name: Paladin
ability: If both of your alive neighbors are good, the three of you are immune to poisoning. Otherwise, you (alone) are sick. (You aren't sick the first night.)

otherNightReminder: Doesn't wake. If the Glutton was killed by the Demon tonight, place the 'drunk 2' marker next to the Demon. The next night, place the 'drunk 1' marker next to the demon.
name: Glutton
ability: You are immune to sickness, drunkenness and poisoning. If the demon kills you, they are drunk for 2 days and 1 night.

name: Hero
ability: You cannot be killed by the Demon. If you are executed, a different player becomes the Hero. If you die and are also poisoned, 2 more players die.

firstNightReminder: Show the Lover 1 of the bluffs you showed the Demon.
name: Lover
ability: The Demon might register as good or as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if either of you is dead. A specific player might register as evil or as a Demon, even if you are dead. You start knowing 1 Demon bluff.

name: Skeptic
ability: You do not know you are the Skeptic. You think you are a different Outsider, but your ability malfunctions. On the first day, after dusk, you and both of your neighbors become sick.

firstNightReminder: The Mourner points at a player: Mark that player as 'drunk'.
otherNightReminder: The Mourner points at a player: Mark that player as 'drunk'.
name: Mourner
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): They are drunk until the end of the following day. If you die, publicly choose one final living player. If they are good, they are drunk until the end of the game.

firstNightReminder: The Druid points at up to 2 players: If they point at 1, mark that player as 'poisoned'. If they point at 2, mark one as 'poisoned', and the other as 'poisoned, knows'. Wake that second player and tell them they have been selected by the Druid.
otherNightReminder: The Druid points at up to 2 players: If they point at 1, mark that player as 'poisoned'. If they point at 2, mark one as 'poisoned', and the other as 'poisoned, knows'. Wake that second player and tell them they have been selected by the Druid.
name: Druid
ability: Each night, choose up to 2 players: They are poisoned until the end of the following day. If you choose more than 1 player, 1 will know they are poisoned.

firstNightReminder: Ask the Renegade Fairy if they want to use their ability. If they do, the Renegade Fairy will point at a player and a good character: Mark that player as ''blessed'' and that character with 'full bad use of'. Wake that player and tell them they were selected by the Fairy Godmother if they're good, or by the Renegade Fairy if they're evil. Show them the character token of the faulty ability they may now use.
otherNightReminder: If the Renegade Fairy has not used their ability yer, ask the Renegade Fairy if they want to use their ability. If they do, the Renegade Fairy will point at a player and a good character: Mark that player as ''blessed'' and that character with 'full bad use of'. Wake that player and tell them they were selected by the Fairy Godmother if they're good, or by the Renegade Fairy if they're evil. Show them the character token of the faulty ability they may now use.
name: Renegade Fairy
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player (not yourself) & a good character: That player gets full use of that character's ability for 1 day & 1 night & it will work so it benefits you. You might register as the Fairy Godmother.

firstNightReminder: The Centurion points at 2 players, 1 of which is good: Mark those players as 'faulty'.
otherNightReminder: The Centurion points at 2 players, 1 of which is good: Mark those players as 'faulty'.
name: Centurion
ability: Each night, choose two players (not yourself, 1 must be good): The next day, the first vote they both don't participate in, fails.

name: Advisor
ability: If a player you nominated dies, their next good neighbors become poisoned for the rest of the game.

otherNightReminder: Doesn't wake. Mark a living neighbor to the plague or to a living sick player as 'sick'.
name: Plague
ability: Each night*, an alive neighbor (to you or an alive sick player) becomes sick, even if you are dead. If you die, the game continues. You also win if all remaining living players are sick. Good wins if you are dead and no-one is sick.

otherNightReminder: The Shadow points at a character with a night action: If that character is in play, place the 'kills' marker next to them. Later that night, place the 'dies' marker(s) next to the player(s) said player picks.
name: Shadow
ability: Each night*, choose a good character with a night action: if in play, whomever that player chooses, dies (including you). The first time you die, whichever living player you last chose to kill for you becomes the new evil Shadow.

otherNightReminder: The Priam points at a player: That player dies. If the Priam is drunk, show them the hand sign for '2' and the Priam points at 2 players: Both die.
name: Priam
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you are drunk, choose 2 players: both die. If a vote to execute you passes and there are more than 3 alive players, it fails instead. [-1 Minion] [+1 Outsider]
